snippet.title: Petit Hedgehog - SAGE 2018 Trailer
snippet.description:
Have a look at what changes are coming to the new release of Petit Hedgehog! All of what you see here will be available to play at this year's Sonic Amateur Games Expo, in addition to some secrets not shown in this video. 

Trailer music by https://soundcloud.com/seychellesradio/

SAGE 2018 will be held at Sonic Fan Games HQ. (https://www.sonicfangameshq.com/)
